sentence: “The Josh Mandel of 2003 — of 2016, even — would not recognize the Josh Mandel of 2021.” ROB ZIMMERMAN, a Democrat who raised funds for Mr. Mandel, a Republican Senate candidate from Ohio who has taken a hard right turn politically from his moderate roots.
